test.name: Check Compare User Count with json

kw.name: Compare User Count With Json
kw.msg: Total Number of Users and User data are matching, API count 12, JSON count 12

kw.name: Should Be True
kw.doc: Fails if the given condition is not true.

test.name: Check Compare User data with id

kw.name: Compare User Data With Id
kw.msg: There is no mismatch on the User data given by User Id 4 this is following data of JSON {'data': {'id': 4, 'email': 'eve.holt@reqres.in', 'first_name': 'Eve', 'last_name': 'Holt', 'avatar': 'https://reqres.in/img/faces/4-image.jpg'}, 'support': {'url': 'https://reqres.in/#support-heading', 'text': 'To keep ReqRes free, contributions towards server costs are appreciated!'}} and the data of API is {'data': {'id': 4, 'email': 'eve.holt@reqres.in', 'first_name': 'Eve', 'last_name': 'Holt', 'avatar': 'https://reqres.in/img/faces/4-image.jpg'}, 'support': {'url': 'https://reqres.in/#support-heading', 'text': 'To keep ReqRes free, contributions towards server costs are appreciated!'}}

kw.name: Should Be True
kw.doc: Fails if the given condition is not true.

kw.name: Compare User Data With Id
kw.msg: There is no mismatch on the User data given by User Id 12 this is following data of JSON {'data': {'id': 12, 'email': 'rachel.howell@reqres.in', 'first_name': 'Rachel', 'last_name': 'Howell', 'avatar': 'https://reqres.in/img/faces/12-image.jpg'}, 'support': {'url': 'https://reqres.in/#support-heading', 'text': 'To keep ReqRes free, contributions towards server costs are appreciated!'}} and the data of API is {'data': {'id': 12, 'email': 'rachel.howell@reqres.in', 'first_name': 'Rachel', 'last_name': 'Howell', 'avatar': 'https://reqres.in/img/faces/12-image.jpg'}, 'support': {'url': 'https://reqres.in/#support-heading', 'text': 'To keep ReqRes free, contributions towards server costs are appreciated!'}}

kw.name: Should Be True
kw.doc: Fails if the given condition is not true.

test.name: Check Compare User data with email

kw.name: Compare User Data With Email
kw.msg: There is no mismatch on the User data given by Email Id of charles.morris@reqres.in this is following data of JSON {'id': 5, 'first_name': 'Charles', 'last_name': 'Morris'} and the data of API is {'id': 5, 'first_name': 'Charles', 'last_name': 'Morris'}

kw.name: Should Be True
kw.doc: Fails if the given condition is not true.

kw.name: Compare User Data With Email
kw.msg: There is no mismatch on the User data given by Email Id of george.edwards@reqres.in this is following data of JSON {'id': 11, 'first_name': 'George', 'last_name': 'Edwards'} and the data of API is {'id': 11, 'first_name': 'George', 'last_name': 'Edwards'}

kw.name: Should Be True
kw.doc: Fails if the given condition is not true.

kw.name: Compare Create User Data
kw.msg:
<Response [201]> {"id":"665","createdAt":"2023-11-21T10:29:05.167Z"} <bound method Response.json of <Response [201]>>
{'id': '665', 'createdAt': '2023-11-21T10:29:05.167Z'}
AssertionError: Name does not match: None and Chethana

kw.name: Should Be True
kw.doc: Fails if the given condition is not true.

kw.name: Compare Update User Data
kw.msg: {'data': {'id': 4, 'email': 'eve.holt@reqres.in', 'first_name': 'Eve', 'last_name': 'Holt', 'avatar': 'https://reqres.in/img/faces/4-image.jpg'}, 'support': {'url': 'https://reqres.in/#support-heading', 'text': 'To keep ReqRes free, contributions towards server costs are appreciated!'}} True Updated user data in the API for ID 4 AssertionError: User data for ID 4 is not available after update

kw.name: Should Be True
kw.doc: Fails if the given condition is not true.

kw.name: Compare Delete User Data
kw.msg: Deleted user data from API the ID is 4 and the status True Still the User ID is in the API of 4 and data in the API ({'data': {'id': 4, 'email': 'eve.holt@reqres.in', 'first_name': 'Eve', 'last_name': 'Holt', 'avatar': 'https://reqres.in/img/faces/4-image.jpg'}, 'support': {'url': 'https://reqres.in/#support-heading', 'text': 'To keep ReqRes free, contributions towards server costs are appreciated!'}}, True)

kw.name: Should Be True
kw.doc: Fails if the given condition is not true.
